column5: Hooray! Thank you for rescuing me.
I will erase you from this and every world!
You'll all be losing to ME today!
A good attitude will take you further than a bad habit.
Your words are as empty as your soul...

column3: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
column5: I coveted that wind I suppose...
That's trash your talkin' Kabu! Ain't no such person as Kirby!
I'm the mighty Ludwig von Koopa!
